video.title: The Last Bastion
video.synopsis: The Robles family, born and raised in the Americas, experiences the highs and lows of the revolutionary drive to Peru's independence.

episodes.synopsis: It's 19th-century Peru. Lorenzo Robles, a Spanish loyalist, comes home in defeat and finds his brother Paco, an independentist, is stirring up trouble.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: As independence fever grows, Lorenzo confronts Paco. A reluctant Rosa María agrees to please her family and marry the older but rich Adolfo.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The liberating forces inch closer as Paco continues his anti-imperialist work. Lorenzo's pay is withheld, and his family helps him and his new wife.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Family circumstances force Paco to become head of household, but he still helps out a friend. Meanwhile, Rosa María and Adolfo's marriage grows tense.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Blas runs away to San Martín's camp while Miguel, still smitten with Rosa María, tries to decide whether to join his father and the patriot forces.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: As the New Year dawns and San Martín's forces grow, Francisco, the Robles patriarch, makes an important decision. Lorenzo recovers at his family's home.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Antonia's mother returns, threatening to reveal family secrets. Meanwhile, San Martín's blockade of Lima causes hunger in all social classes.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Paco grows disillusioned after he and Catalina are assaulted by men claiming to be patriots. Adolfo pivots opportunistically.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Paco's parents refuse to accept Catalina, a mixed-race puppeteer. His mother, Josefa, tries to bribe María Mazombé to take Antonia away.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Paco and Lorenzo are appalled to learn the truth about their father. Meanwhile, Doña Constanza overhears a secret from a feverish and delirious Adolfo.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: San Martín and the Spanish viceroy try to come to an agreement while Adolfo plots how to avoid going to Spain, where his past could be revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: The liberating army enters an empty and starved Lima, where Paco confronts the bandits who attacked him and Catalina. Blas comes home to La Magdalena.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: San Martín deliberates how best to proceed with independence, while Blas and Tadea struggle with their personal liberation from slavery.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: María Mazombé confesses her secret, forcing Paco to confront his mother. Furious that women can't sign the Act of Independence, Antonia finds a way.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Francisco is incensed to learn he's been denounced, and inadvertently crosses Blas. Meanwhile, Teresa steps in to save Rosa María.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Catalina is beseeched by Monteagudo's advances while Paco recovers. Meanwhile, Lorenzo contends with Germán's continued tantrums against the patriots.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Francisco comes up with a scheme to pay what he considers an unfair fine. Lorenzo must make a decision to determine his fate.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Miguel takes dangerous risks to save Francisco, Rosa María's father. Paco considers an offer from San Martín, while Adolfo gossips about family.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Teresa gives birth, bringing joy to the Robles family, except for Rosa María. When Evaristo goes to Justina's, he's shocked by what Miguel has done.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Monteagudo grows increasingly obsessed, threatening Paco's political possibilities. Paco's own doubts grow so intensely, he asks to talk to San Martín.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: San Martín must travel to conference with Simón Bolívar, but he's reluctant to leave Peru in Monteagudo's hands. Lorenzo has a strange encounter.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Monteagudo wants to tighten the screws on Lorenzo, while Paco's campaign takes off. Isabel decides to take her revenge, with catastrophic results.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Monteagudo tells Paco what really happened with Isabel, forcing his hand. San Martín decides to break with tradition when bestowing medals.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Shattered, Lorenzo confronts Teresa, who tells him the truth. Torre Tagle, left to govern Peru while San Martín is away, plots against Monteagudo.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Torre Tagle confronts Monteagudo and the standoff sparks a confession from Rosa. Lorenzo is beside himself and Josefa puts two and two together.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: San Martín prepares to leave Peru. Adolfo considers a move too, now that he's a deputy, while Rosa María agonizes about the future of her unborn child.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Josefa and Rosa María devise a plot to hide the truth from Adolfo. But Adolfo has his own realization — about none other than Doña Constanza.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: When Rosa María's moment of truth comes, she sees her mother, Teresa, Paco and Tadea all have her back. But how long can they keep Adolfo in the dark?
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo learns the truth and plots revenge. In the meantime, the royalist forces have fought their way back and the new government has collapsed.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo pivots once more, hoping that being a mediator between royalists and patriots will give him an advantage. Lorenzo is tortured by doubts.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: After searching fruitlessly for Rosa María, Paco and Miguel find María Mazombé instead and bring her home. Doña Constanza brings Rosa María a package.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: As Simón Bolívar becomes Peru's new liberator, Paco has to decide where he stands politically. He and Catalina must also determine how to proceed.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Francisco makes a catastrophic mistake, and Miguel suggests a solution that, unknown to the Robleses, will bring further troubles. Paco visits Bolívar.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Monteagudo returns to Peru and everyone is miserable but Bolívar. As Lorenzo begins to consider a life outside the military, he suffers a terrible blow.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: In the end, the Robles family endures deaths and births, as well as reconciliations and separations, and adapts to life in a free and sovereign Peru.
episodes.title: Episode 35
